00023 #ifndef _CTK_PROFILE_H
00024 #define _CTK_PROFILE_H
00025 
00031 #include "ctk_common.h"
00032 #include "ctk_init.h"
00033 #include <limits.h>
00034 
00035 #ifdef __cplusplus
00036 extern "C" {
00037 #endif
00038 
00040 typedef struct {
00041     unsigned long long start;
00042     unsigned long long end;
00043 } ctk_profile_t;
00044 
00049 static inline unsigned long long
00050 ctk_profile_gettimeval() {
00051     register unsigned long tbu, tbl, tbu_check;
00052     do {
00053         __asm__ __volatile__ ("mftbu %0" : "=r" (tbu));
00054         __asm__ __volatile__ ("mftbl %0" : "=r" (tbl));
00055         /* to make sure there hasn't been a carry over between 
00056            checking tbu and tbl */
00057         __asm__ __volatile__ ("mftbu %0" : "=r" (tbu_check));
00058     } while (tbu != tbu_check);
00059     return ((unsigned long long)tbu << 32 | (unsigned long long)tbl);
00060 }
00061 
00066 static inline void ctk_profile_start(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00067     CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT(prof != NULL);
00068     prof->start = ctk_profile_gettimeval();
00069 }
00070 
00076 static inline int ctk_profile_read(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00077     prof->end = ctk_profile_gettimeval();
00078     return (prof->end - prof->start) / (int)(ctk_timebase_clock * 1.0e-3);
00079 }
00080 
00086 static inline int ctk_profile_read_in_msec(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00087     prof->end = ctk_profile_gettimeval();
00088     return (prof->end - prof->start) / (int)(ctk_timebase_clock * 1.0e-3);
00089 }
00090 
00097 static inline int ctk_profile_end(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00098     return ctk_profile_read(prof);
00099 }
00100 
00106 static inline int ctk_profile_read_in_usec(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00107     prof->end = ctk_profile_gettimeval();
00108     return (prof->end - prof->start) / (int)(ctk_timebase_clock * 1.0e-6);
00109 }
00110 
00116 static inline int ctk_profile_read_in_clock(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00117     prof->end = ctk_profile_gettimeval();
00118     return (prof->end - prof->start);
00119 }
00120 
00121 #ifdef __cplusplus
00122 }
00123 #endif
00124 
00125 #endif /* _CTK_PROFILE_H */
